Key Match Events: Trae Young's 49-foot buzzer-beater gave the Hawks the win
Collin Sexton tied the game with a 3-pointer with four seconds left
Walker Kessler's back-to-back dunks put the Jazz ahead 114-113
Pre-Game Insights: There is no mention of pre-game insights in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Trae Young expressed confidence in his shot and took pride in being efficient and knowing when to give the ball up and when to score
Hawks coach Quin Snyder praised Young's play and ability to control the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a tight finish with multiple lead changes
Trae Young had 24 points and 20 assists while committing only two turnovers
Others: The game was played on Tuesday night in Salt Lake City
The Hawks' franchise leader in assists and made 3-pointers, Trae Young, put on a clinic on how to control a game
